snippet: An autopsy found that Serge Duthely of Canarsie, who had been arrested on Sunday on a drunken-driving charge, had hanged himself with his T-shirt.
abstract: Drunk-driving suspect Serge Duthely hangs himself in Brooklyn police station house, becoming third person to die by hanging in a New York Police Dept holding cell since May 2015.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: An autopsy found that Serge Duthely of Canarsie, who had been arrested on Sunday on a drunken-driving charge, had hanged himself with his T-shirt.

headline.main: Brooklyn Suicide Is Third Hanging in City Holding Cells Since May
headline.print_headline: Third Man Since May Kills Himself in Police Cell
